Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 157th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Carl Reyna (BRO)...
Injured on 5/21/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/27/2015 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2015...
Hit for the cycle against Boston on 6/16/2016...
Drove in 9 runs against Boston on 6/16/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2016, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2016, hitting .376 with 5 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Released by Chicago on 10/20/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/4/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
